premise_source_doc_sentence: Napoleon Bonaparte  (  -LSB- nəˈpoʊliən_ˈboʊnəpɑrt -RSB- -LSB- napɔleɔ̃ bɔnapaʁt -RSB- ; 15 August 1769 -- 5 May 1821  )  was a French military and political leader who rose to prominence during the French Revolution and led several successful campaigns during the French Revolutionary Wars .

claim: Napoleon's campaigns have been lost or forgotten.
